title: Sustained Engagement and Collaboration Strategies in Online Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and core social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Social studies curriculum conducting collaborative learning activities using CMC (Computer-Mediated Communication) tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners will be able to interact continuously ≥3 times per week through structured online discussion activities
Learners will achieve ≥80% collaboration efficiency when performing CMC-based tasks in 4-member small groups
Learners will maintain ≥95% adherence to assignment deadlines through assessment-linked interactive activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
